io.textile.textile

Class Files

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.textile.textile.Files

  • public class Files
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides access to Textile files related APIs

    • Nested Class Summary

      static interface  Files.PreparedFilesHandler

    • Method Detail

      • prepare

        public void prepare(java.lang.String data,
                    java.lang.String threadId,
                    Files.PreparedFilesHandler handler)
        Prepare raw data to later add to a Textile thread
        Parameters:
        data - Raw base64 string data
        threadId - The thread id the data will be added to
        handler - An object that will get called with the results of the prepare operation

                          java.lang.String threadId,

        Parameters:
        path - The path to the file containing the data to prepare
        threadId - The thread id the data will be added to
        handler - An object that will get called with the results of the prepare operation

        Prepare raw data synchronously to later add to a Textile thread
        Parameters:
        data - Raw base64 string data
        threadId - The thread id the data will be added to
        Returns:
        An object containing data about the prepared files that will be used to add to the thread later

                                             long minWidth)
                                      throws java.lang.Exception

        Parameters:
